items.name: Test Cube.js Schema Generation Flow
items.description: Create test microservice (3+ models), trigger generation, verify core/domain files, file contents, cube naming, Git commit.

items.name: Test Replication Script Generation
items.description: Verify publication/subscription SQL files and README generated. Validate SQL syntax, table names, placeholders, schema prefix.

items.name: Test Cross-Cube Schema Generation
items.description: Create CrossCubeConfig with 2+ microservice joins. Trigger generation. Verify SQL JOINs, measures, dimensions, client_id filter.

items.name: Test Cube.js Server Schema Loading
items.description: Pull schemas to Cube.js server, reload, verify all cubes in /meta API. Check extends relationship, no validation errors.

items.name: Test Frontend Cube.js Queries
items.description: Set up test app with @ps/analytics-core. Configure CubeProvider. Execute useCubeQuery. Test filters, date ranges, multi-tenant clientId.

items.name: Test Dashboard Configuration Flow
items.description: Create DashboardConfig, metrics, widgets, filters. Load dashboard in frontend. Verify widgets render, filters work, loading/error states.

items.name: Create Troubleshooting Guide
items.description: Cover 15+ common issues: generation failures, replication lag, query errors, multi-tenancy, frontend connection, performance, Git push failures.

items.name: Performance Testing with Sample Data
items.description: Generate 100K+ records, replicate to analytics DB, measure query response times. Simple <500ms, cross-cube <2s. Test 10 concurrent users.

items.name: Security Testing
items.description: Test multi-tenant isolation, SECURITY_CONTEXT enforcement, API authentication, SQL injection in schemas, replication user permissions, CORS.

items.name: Create Integration Test Suite
items.description: Automated tests: schema generation, API endpoints, Cube.js queries, dashboard rendering. Configure for CI/CD pipeline.

items.name: Final Documentation Review
items.description: Review all docs for accuracy, cross-reference, add missing sections, create index. Get team lead sign-off. Publish.

items.name: Create Dashboard Page in Consuming Application
items.description: Create route/page with CubeProvider, useDashboardConfig, FilterBar, DashboardGrid. Render correct chart type per widget. Responsive. Per-widget error handling.

items.name: Seed the lookup models for all Compute generated apps
items.description:

items.name: Clean up definitions: naming, data types, validations
items.description: Thorough review and cleanup of LLM-generated definitions. Correct naming conventions, adjust data types, add missing validations, remove hallucinated fields, ensure Compute compatibility. Expected 3-day effort.

items.name: Fix bugs reported from VoIP testing
items.description: Address bugs reported during VoIP app testing. Predecessor: VoIP testing task.

items.name: Generate user manual for VoIP app
items.description: Trigger user manual generation and verify it appears in the Drawer menu.

items.name: Marketing V2 Switchoff: Update Dependencies & Migrate to V3
Audit Marketing V2 dependencies across all apps
items.description: Identify all apps, services, and frontend routes that reference Marketing V2 endpoints, components, or data. Document dependency map.

parent_task.name: Marketing V2 Switchoff: Update Dependencies & Migrate to V3

items.name: Update frontend routes and components to Marketing V3
items.description: Update ps-admin-microfe routing, menu items, imports, and page references from Marketing V2 to Marketing V3. Predecessor: 101.1

parent_task.name: Marketing V2 Switchoff: Update Dependencies & Migrate to V3

items.name: Update CRM app references from Marketing V2 to V3
items.description: Update CRM marketing list integrations, campaign references, and any API calls pointing to Marketing V2 endpoints. Predecessor: 101.1

parent_task.name: Marketing V2 Switchoff: Update Dependencies & Migrate to V3

items.name: Update dependent compute apps referencing Marketing V2
items.description: Update any other compute-generated apps (1000 SME, Ecommerce, etc.) that have cross-references to Marketing V2. Predecessor: 101.1

parent_task.name: Marketing V2 Switchoff: Update Dependencies & Migrate to V3

items.name: Remove Marketing V2 code from microfe
items.description: Clean up Marketing V2 components, routes, imports, and unused dependencies from ps-admin-microfe. Predecessor: 101.2

parent_task.name: Marketing V2 Switchoff: Update Dependencies & Migrate to V3

items.name: Fix bugs from Marketing V3 migration testing
items.description: Address bugs found during testing of all updated apps with Marketing V3. Predecessor: Marketing V3 migration testing.

parent_task.name: Marketing V2 Switchoff: Update Dependencies & Migrate to V3

items.name: Post-switchoff monitoring
items.description: Monitor for errors, broken references, and user-reported issues for 24-48 hours after Marketing V2 switchoff. Predecessor: 101.8

parent_task.name: Marketing V2 Switchoff: Update Dependencies & Migrate to V3

items.name: Review and verify migration pipeline with CRM-V3 models
items.description: Trigger generateCubeSchemas for CRM-V3 twice: first run (no snapshot) should produce initial 003. Then modify a model and run again. Verify: snapshot saved correctly, diff detects changes, 003/004/004a files generated correctly, blocked changes logged. Fix any issues found during review.

items.name: Compute: Dashboard Controller & Schema Refactoring
items.description: The Prisma schema has cubeName/measureName/dimensionName fields (Phase 1 done), but the Joi validation schemas and controllers still reference the OLD fields (modelId, fieldId, aggregationType). Refactor all 3 dashboard entity controllers + schemas to match. Review diffs.

items.name: Review all refactored files and run tests
items.description: Review the diffs across all changed files. Run the test suite. Fix any failing tests or address review feedback.

items.name: Compute: First CRM-V3 Cube Generation Test Run
items.description: Run the full Compute generation pipeline for CRM-V3 with generateCubeSchemasFlag=true to produce actual cube schemas in the analytics-cube repo. This proves the backend works end-to-end. Must be done after the subscriber DDL pipeline is built. Drive the API call, verify output, and fix any issues.

items.name: Configure env vars and trigger CRM-V3 cube generation
items.description: Set ANALYTICS_CUBE_GIT_URL, ANALYTICS_CUBE_REPO_BRANCH on Compute dev instance. POST /api/v1/analytics/microservices/:crmV3Id/generate-cube-schemas. Verify: core/ and domain/ cube files created, replication scripts generated, snapshot saved, changes pushed to analytics-cube repo. Troubleshoot if generation fails.

parent_task.name: Compute: First CRM-V3 Cube Generation Test Run

items.name: Review generated cube schemas and SQL for correctness
items.description: Review 3-5 generated core cube files. Verify: correct table references, client_id filter, measures for numeric fields, dimensions, time dimensions, FIELD_TYPE_TO_CUBE_TYPE mappings. Domain files use extends pattern. Dry-run 003_subscriber_migration.sql against analytics DB to validate syntax. Fix any template issues.

parent_task.name: Compute: First CRM-V3 Cube Generation Test Run

items.name: Data Warehouse: CRM Replication Setup (MVP)
items.description: Set up PostgreSQL logical replication from CRM-V3 source DB to the analytics warehouse DB. Scope: CRM only (44 tables). Prerequisite: analytics-cube-db pod must be running in dev namespace. Execute DB commands, prepare SQL, and troubleshoot.

items.name: Enable wal_level=logical on CRM-V3 source DB
items.description: Check current wal_level on CRM-V3 dev DB with `SHOW wal_level;`. If not 'logical', update postgresql.conf and restart. Brief CRM DB downtime on dev.

items.name: Seed CRM-V3 schema on analytics warehouse DB
items.description: Run CRM-V3's Prisma migrations against the analytics warehouse DB to create the crm-v3 schema and all 44 tables. The subscriber DB needs table structures BEFORE subscription. Verify with: SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'crm-v3';

items.name: Review pub.sql, update sub.sql, apply both
items.description: Review pub.sql against current CRM-V3 Prisma schema (verify 44 tables are correct, no internal tables included). Update sub.sql with correct credentials and FQDN host. Apply pub.sql on CRM-V3 source DB, then sub.sql on analytics warehouse DB. Verify publication/subscription created correctly.

items.name: Verify CRM replication end-to-end
items.description: Check pg_stat_subscription (all tables 'r' state), compare row counts for key tables (Company, Person, Opportunity), INSERT a test row on source and verify it appears on subscriber. Run all verification queries.

items.name: Document replication runbook for CRM
items.description: Write the CRM replication runbook in data-warehouse-db/README.md: commands used, monitoring queries, recovery procedures (skip record vs full resync), the 'disable auto-migration' K8s change. Review for accuracy.

items.name: Update IE Platform
items.description: New Models and new fields to accommodate the full vision of IE

items.name: Generate HowTos and instructions in User Manual with screenshots
items.description: When generating the user manual for each app, lets add a section that generates a full list of Howtos, with descriptions, and instructions  on how to do them.  Include screenshots.

items.name: Functionality to retake the course
items.description: Training admin/supervisor should have the ability to reset the course for student to retake the initial assessment
